shoulder_mobility.name: Shoulder Pass-Through
shoulder_mobility.description: Hold a band or towel with wide grip, pass it over your head and behind your back

shoulder_mobility.name: Wall Slides
shoulder_mobility.description: Back against wall, arms in 'W' position, slide up to 'Y' position

hip_mobility.name: 90/90 Hip Stretch
hip_mobility.description: Sit with both legs at 90 degrees, lean forward over front leg

hip_mobility.name: Hip CAR (Controlled Articular Rotation)
hip_mobility.description: On all fours, make large circles with your knee

spine_mobility.name: Cat-Cow
spine_mobility.description: On all fours, alternate between arching and rounding spine

spine_mobility.name: Thoracic Spine Windmill
spine_mobility.description: Side-lying, top arm sweeps in arc from front to back

ankle_mobility.name: Wall Ankle Mobilization
ankle_mobility.description: Lunge position with front foot few inches from wall, drive knee forward
